question: Will the Thunder beat the Pacers 4-1?
description:
This market will resolve to "Yes" if the Oklahoma City Thunder defeat the Indiana Pacers in 5 games, resulting in a 4-1 series outcome. Otherwise, this market will resolve to "No".

If the Indiana Pacers win more than one game in their NBA Finals matchup against the Oklahoma City Thunder in the 2025 NBA Playoffs, this market will immediately resolve to "No".

The resolution source will be NBA.com.

events.title: NBA Finals: Thunder vs. Pacers series outcome
events.description: This is a market on the outcome of the 2025 NBA Finals matchup between the Oklahoma City Thunder and Indiana Pacers.

question: Rockies vs. Marlins
description:
In the upcoming MLB game, scheduled for June 2 at 6:40PM ET:
If the Colorado Rockies win, the market will resolve to “Rockies”.
If the Miami Marlins win, the market will resolve to “Marlins”.
If the game is postponed, this market will remain open until the game has been completed.
If the game is canceled entirely, with no make-up game, this market will resolve 50-50.
To know when a postponed game will be played, please check the home team's schedule on MLB.com for the listed team and look for the game described as a makeup game.

question: Will the price of Bitcoin be between $104K and $105K on June 2 at 5 PM ET?
description:
This market will resolve according to the final "Close" price of the Binance 1 minute candle for BTC/USDT 2 June '25 17:00 in the ET timezone. Otherwise, this market will resolve to "No".

The resolution source for this market is Binance, specifically the BTC/USDT "Close" prices currently available at https://www.binance.com/en/trade/BTC_USDT with "1m" and "Candles" selected on the top bar.

If the reported value falls exactly between two brackets, then this market will resolve to the higher range bracket.

Please note that this market is about the price according to Binance BTC/USDT, not according to other sources or spot markets.
